t: GOLDSIT OFFICE FURNITURE – Goldsit Office Furniture
s: As Goldsit, our founder Osman Tugral starts the business with manufacturing molds for bus chairs in 1977. He establishes the brand Goldsit, firstly with producing office chairs in 1993 in an area of 10.764 ft² than integrates office furniture manufacturing in 2005.
